name: js-copytable
body:
### Welcome to js-copytable ### What? Ever wanted to directly copy a table on a website to a Microsoft Excel Worksheet? Just use js-copytable! ![Copying into Microsoft Exel](http://comfreek.github.com/js-copytable/images/screenshot-excel.png) ### How? Embed these two files in your HTML document: ``` ``` Then, create your button (with an optional, but recommend container) and your table: ```
``` And finally the actual script which initiates js-copytable: ```window.onload = function () { copyTable.simpleInit({ button: document.getElementById("btn"), table: document.getElementById("tbl"), moviePath: "ZeroClipboard.swf", success: function (text) { alert("Successfully copied the table! The contents were:\n\n"+text); }, accessDenied: function () { alert("You have denied access in Internet Explorer!"); } }); };``` Be sure to upload _ZeroClipboard.swf_ to your server too! It's a "fallback" for other browsers than IE. ### Browser Support?! * IE 6+ * All other browsers with Flash enabled ### Contact? Email: **comfreek** | **outlook** | **com** Twitter: [@ComFreek](http://twitter.com/comfreek) # Thanks To.... * js-copytable uses [ZeroClipboard](https://github.com/jonrohan/ZeroClipboard) as a "fallback" for other browsers than IE which do not support clipboard access.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Copies the contents of a table into the clipboard for pasting in Microsoft Excel.
